projects.title: Cryptocurrency tracker
projects.name: CRYPTO-GANG
projects.description: Cryptocurrency portfolio manager. Allow the user to track the crypto market, to have a watchlist and a representation of his wallet. It also allow the user to use a calculator to simulate future profits or loss.

projects.title: Student Planner
projects.name: E-STUDY
projects.description: Student planning organizer allowing user to have all the information about his cursus in the same place (schedule, program, grades, notes, classes, assignements and evaluations.
projects.stack: React JS, Material UI, Rest API, MySQL, MVC

projects.title: Personal Budget
projects.name: E-BUDGET
projects.description: Personal budget web app inspired by YNAB with graph and reports.
projects.stack: React JS, Material UI,GraphQL, Mongo DB, Atoms, Redux
